document.full_text: ike davis's two-run shot in the seventh sent the mets past the diamondbacks on a night that started a little shaky for starter mike pelfrey.
document.title: mets 4, diamondbacks 1: a turn to the right and a second look is what the mets need
lines_and_colors: ike davis's two-run shot in the seventh sent the mets past the diamondbacks on a night that started a little shaky for starter mike pelfrey.
